name: Slinky Olympics
description:
Game prototype made over a 7 day period for the Awful Jams - Sports2 Jam.  Game is in very early stages, with expanded ideas and features to still be implemented.

Features (or lack thereof):

* Active Ragdoll physics - Inspired by the works and coding of Evan Greenwood.  Slinky Jocks to help us get through this pandemic.  We need SPORTS!!!! 

* 3 Event types - Highjump, Hurdles and Javelin (more events planned).

* 2 Player action (1 keyboard or with a combination of controllers and keyboard).  It is possible to play the game by yourself, but a lot more fun with a friend.

* Currently low level of game juice and total lack of sound due to time constraints (I started very late in Jam).  This will soon be changed

* No tutorial - but i'm sure a smart person like you can figure it out.

* Game for windows, created in Unity, by a sole South African Hobbyist dev.
